aws::graph::propositions: Commercial Agreement and Business Relationship Risks
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of disruption of ongoing business.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of loss of management focus on existing businesses.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of impairment of other relationships.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of variability in revenue from entering into agreements.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of variability in revenue from amending agreements.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of variability in revenue from terminating agreements.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of variability in income from entering into relationships.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of variability in income from amending relationships.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of variability in income from terminating relationships.
Commercial agreements, strategic alliances, and business relationships create risk of difficulty integrating under the commercial agreements.
